name: Calendar
description: Display upcoming calendar events from Google Calendar

config.title: Google Calendar Settings
config.description: Create OAuth 2.0 credentials in Google Cloud Console (https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials), enable the Google Calendar API and set the authorized redirect URI to http://localhost:5173/api/google/callback (or your deployed URL). Paste the resulting Client ID and Client Secret here.

fields.label: Client ID
fields.description: The OAuth Client ID from Google Cloud Console → APIs & Services → Credentials.

fields.label: Client Secret
fields.description: The OAuth Client Secret generated alongside the Client ID. Store securely; you can regenerate it in the console if needed.

fields.label: Max Events
fields.description: Maximum number of events to display (default: 12)

fields.label: Calendar Colors
fields.description: Optional color overrides for specific calendars. Use the exact calendar summary shown in Google Calendar or in the MMM server logs when events are fetched.

itemFields.label: Calendar Name
itemFields.description: The exact name of your calendar (check server logs for available names)

itemFields.label: Color Class
itemFields.description: Select a color for calendar events
